attributes.action: Ensure the addition of “the right to an abortion” under the new Bill of Rights.
attributes.additional_details: The right to an abortion is basic healthcare that anyone with a uterus should be entitled to. It protects victims of rape, incest, child-mothers and allows people to make their own decisions about their bodies and their lives. Bringing a child into a life they are not wanted in is unethical and unfair. It prevents suffering for both parent and child. It is a necessary procedure and everyone who wants one should be entitled to one!
attributes.background: To protect the rights of people with a uterus. Ensure our health care rights are protected and allow people the right to choose. In order to do so, this right needs to be protected by law.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619334
